author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Fred. Olsen Cruise Lines: ‘Around the World’ in 107 nights with Fred. Olsen Cruise Lines!Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Fred. Olsen Cruise Lines: ‘Around the World’ in 107 nights with Fred. Olsen Cruise Lines! Published on : Thursday, August 27, 2015
Fred. Olsen Cruise Lines’ new dedicated ‘Around the World Voyage 2017’ brochure showcases an exceptional itinerary and the chance to explore the planet in a magical 107 nights! Departing from Southampton on 3rd January 2017, aboard smaller, more intimate Black Watch, this circumnavigation of the globe promises a shopping list of unforgettable memories and experiences!
Guests who book this ‘once-in-a-lifetime’ cruise – from as little as £94 per person, per night –
can visit the spectacular lost city of Machu Picchu; laze on the beaches of the Caribbean and the Maldives; climb the iconic Sydney Harbour Bridge; enjoy afternoon tea at Raffles in Singapore; and absorb the spellbinding beauty of New Zealand. The list of experiences is endless!
In addition, guests will receive up to £550 per person free on board spending credit* on Outside cabins and above . Solo travellers can also benefit from reduced single supplement on selected twin Outside cabins.
Source:- Fred. Olsen Cruise Lines
